trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Workflow
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 工作流程

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell® Workflow brings the power of Windows Workflow Foundation to Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell® 工作階段將 Windows Workflow Foundation 的功能帶給 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: You can write workflows in XAML or in the Windows PowerShell language and run them just as you would run a cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您現在可以使用 XAML 或使用 Windows PowerShell 語言來撰寫工作流程，以及透過與 Cmdlet 相同的執行方式來執行工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) cmdlet gets workflw commands and the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet gets help for workflows.
trans-unit.target: [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) Cmdlet 可取得工作流程命令，而 [Get-help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) Cmdlet 可取得工作流程的說明。

trans-unit.source: Workflows are sequences of multicomputer management activities that are long-running, repeatable, frequent, parallelizable, interruptible, suspendable, and restartable.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程是一系列長時間執行、可重複、經常性、平行式、可中斷、可暫停，以及可重新啟動的多部電腦管理活動。

trans-unit.source: Workflows can be resumed from an intentional or accidental interruption, such as a network outage, a Windows restart, or a power failure.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程可以從蓄意或意外中斷 (例如網路中斷、Windows 重新啟動，或電源中斷) 中恢復繼續運作。

trans-unit.source: Workflows are also portable; they can be exported as or imported from XAML files.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程也是可攜式的；您可以將它們匯出為 XAML 檔案，或從 XAML 檔案匯入它們。

trans-unit.source: You can write custom session configurations that allow workflow or activities in a workflow to be run by delegated or subordinate users.
trans-unit.target: 您可以撰寫自訂工作階段設定，來允許工作流程或工作流程中的活動能夠由委派或下屬使用者執行。

trans-unit.source: The following are the benefits of Windows PowerShell Workflow
trans-unit.target: 下列為 Windows PowerShell 工作流程的好處

trans-unit.source: Automation of sequenced, long-running tasks.
trans-unit.target: 自動化連續性、長時間執行的工作。

trans-unit.source: **Remote monitoring of long-running tasks**.
trans-unit.target: **遠端監視長時間執行的工作**。

trans-unit.source: Status and progress of activities are visible at any time.
trans-unit.target: 隨時可觀看活動的狀態與進度。

trans-unit.source: Multicomputer management.
trans-unit.target: 多部電腦管理。

trans-unit.source: Simultaneously run tasks as workflows on hundreds of managed nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在數百個受管理節點上以工作流程形式同時執行工作。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Workflow includes a built-in library of common management parameters, such as **PSComputerName**, which enable multi-computer management scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 工作流程包括一個一般管理參數的內建程式庫，例如 **PSComputerName**，它可以支援多部電腦管理案例。

trans-unit.source: Single task execution of complex processes.
trans-unit.target: 以單一工作執行方式執行複雜的處理程序。

trans-unit.source: You can combine related scripts that implement an entire end-to-end scenario into a single workflow.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將實作整個端對端案例的相關指令碼結合成單一工作流程。

trans-unit.source: **Persistence.**: a workflow is saved (or check-pointed) at specific points defined by its author so you can resume the workflow from the last persisted task (or checkpoint), instead of restarting the workflow from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: **持續性**：工作流程會在其作者定義的特定時間點儲存 (或建立檢查點)，因此您可以從上一個持續工作 (或檢查點) 繼續工作流程，而不需要從頭開始重新啟動工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Robustness.
trans-unit.target: 健全性。

trans-unit.source: Automated failure recovery.
trans-unit.target: 自動化失敗修復。

trans-unit.source: Workflows survive planned and unplanned restarts.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程可在計劃性與非計劃性重新啟動之後繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: You can suspend workflow execution and then resume the workflow from the last persistence point.
trans-unit.target: 您可以暫停工作流程執行，然後從上一個持續時間點繼續工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Workflow authors can designate specific activities to be re-run in case of failure on one or more managed nodes.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程作者可以指定在一或多個受管理節點失敗時，要重新執行的特定活動。

trans-unit.source: Ability to disconnect, reconnect, and run in disconnected sessions.
trans-unit.target: 可以在已中斷連線的工作階段中中斷連線、重新連線，以及執行的能力。

trans-unit.source: Users can connect and disconnect from the workflow server, but the workflow runs continuously.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以與工作流程伺服器連線及中斷連線，但是工作流程會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: You can log off of the client computer or restart the client computer and monitor the workflow execution from another computer without interrupting the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 您可以登出用戶端電腦或重新啟動用戶端電腦，以及在不中斷工作流程的情況下從另一部電腦監視工作流程執行。

trans-unit.source: Scheduling.
trans-unit.target: 排程。

trans-unit.source: Workflow tasks can be scheduled like any Windows PowerShell cmdlet or script.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程工作的排定方式和任何 Windows PowerShell Cmdlet 或指令碼一樣。

trans-unit.source: Workflow and Connection Throttling.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程與連線節流處理。

trans-unit.source: Workflow execution and connections to nodes can be throttled, thus enabling scalability and high-availability scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 可以針對工作流程執行與節點的連線進行節流處理，這可以提供延展性與高可用性。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Web Access
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell Web 存取

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell® Web Access is a Windows Server 2012 feature that lets users run Windows PowerShell commands and scripts in a web-based console.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell® Web 存取是一個 Windows Server 2012 功能，可以讓使用者在網頁式主控台中執行 Windows PowerShell 命令與指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Devices that use the web-based console do not require Windows PowerShell, remote management software, or browser plug-in installations.
trans-unit.target: 使用網頁式主控台的裝置不需要 Windows PowerShell、遠端管理軟體，或瀏覽器外掛程式安裝。

trans-unit.source: All that is required is a properly-configured Windows PowerShell Web Access gateway and a client device browser that supports JavaScript® and accepts cookies.
trans-unit.target: 它們只需要正確設定的 Windows PowerShell Web 存取閘道，以及支援 JavaScript® 並接受 Cookie 的用戶端裝置瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Deploy Windows PowerShell Web Access](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=221050).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[部署 Windows PowerShell Web 存取](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=221050)。

trans-unit.source: New Windows PowerShell ISE Features
trans-unit.target: 新的 Windows PowerShell ISE 功能

trans-unit.source: For Windows PowerShell 3.0, Windows PowerShell® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) has many new features, including IntelliSense, Show-Command window, a unified Console Pane, snippets, brace-matching, expand-collapse sections, auto-save, recent items list, rich copy, block copy, and full support for writing Windows PowerShell script workflows.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell® 整合式指令碼環境 (ISE) 針對 Windows PowerShell 3.0 有許多新功能，包括 IntelliSense、顯示命令視窗、統一的主控台窗格、程式碼片段、括號對稱、展開折疊區段、自動儲存、最近使用的項目清單、多種內容複製、區塊複製，以及針對撰寫 Windows PowerShell 指令碼工作流程的完整支援。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Windows_PowerShell_ISE [v3]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dfa54d47-60c6-4fff-8197-c747e8d411bb).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Windows_PowerShell_ISE [v3]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dfa54d47-60c6-4fff-8197-c747e8d411bb)。

trans-unit.source: Support for Microsoft .NET Framework 4
trans-unit.target: 支援 Microsoft .NET Framework 4

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell is built against the Common Language Runtime 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 是針對 Common Language Runtime 4.0 所建立。

trans-unit.source: Cmdlet, script, and workflow authors can use the new Microsoft .NET Framework 4 classes in Windows PowerShell, with features that include Application Compatibility and Deployment, Managed Extensibility Framework, Parallel Computing, Networking, Windows Communication Foundation and Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet、指令碼與工作流程作者可以使用 Windows PowerShell 中新的 Microsoft .NET Framework 4 類別，其功能包括應用程式相容性與部署、Managed Extensibility Framework、平行運算、網路、Windows Communication Foundation 及 Windows Workflow Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Support for Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: 支援 Windows 預先安裝環境

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 is an optional component of Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE) 4.0 for Windows 8.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 是適用於 Windows 8 之 Windows 預先安裝環境 (Windows PE) 4.0 的選用元件。

trans-unit.source: Windows PE is a minimal operating system that starts a computer that has no operating system and prepares it for Windows installation.
trans-unit.target: Windows PE 是啟動尚未安裝作業系統之電腦的最小作業系統，並且可以讓電腦準備好以安裝 Windows。

trans-unit.source: Windows PE can be used to partition and format hard drives, copy disk images to a computer, and initiate Windows Setup from a network share.
trans-unit.target: Windows PE 可以用來分割及格式化硬碟、複製磁碟映像至電腦，以及從網路共用位置起始 Windows 安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 can be used on Windows PE to manage deployment, diagnostics, and recovery scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 可以在 Windows PE 上使用，以管理部署、診斷與修復案例。

trans-unit.source: Disconnected Sessions
trans-unit.target: 已中斷連線的工作階段

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, persistent user-managed sessions ("PSSessions") that you create by using the New-PSSession cmdlet are saved on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，您使用 New-PSSession Cmdlet 建立的持續性使用者管理的工作階段 ("PSSessions") 會儲存在遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: They are no longer dependent on the session in which they were created.
trans-unit.target: 它們已經不再與它們建立所在的工作階段相依。

trans-unit.source: You can now disconnect from a session without disrupting the commands that are running in the session.
trans-unit.target: 您現在可以與工作階段中斷連線，而不會中斷工作階段中正在執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: You can close the session and shut down your computer.
trans-unit.target: 您可以關閉工作階段並關閉您的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Later, you can reconnect to the session from a different session on the same or on a different computer.
trans-unit.target: 稍後您可以在相同或不同的電腦上，從不同的工作階段重新連線至工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The **ComputerName** parameter of the [Get-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b2b10531-d0df-4746-b877-e75c09955cb6) cmdlet now gets all of the user's sessions that connect to the computer, even if they were started in a different session on a different computer.
trans-unit.target: [Get-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b2b10531-d0df-4746-b877-e75c09955cb6) Cmdlet 的 **ComputerName** 參數現在可以取得已連線到電腦的所有使用者工作階段，即使它們是在其他電腦上不同的工作階段中啟動。

trans-unit.source: You can connect to the sessions, get the results of commands, start new commands, and then disconnect from the session.
trans-unit.target: 您可以連線至工作階段、取得命令的結果、啟動新的命令，然後與工作階段中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: New cmdlets have been added to support the Disconnected Sessions feature, including [Disconnect-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/f8f95111-612f-4cba-9098-77904b0473d8), [Connect-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b803dd29-f208-4079-80d4-db04d778f060), and Receive-PSSession, and new parameters have been added to cmdlets that manage PSSessions, such as the **InDisconnectedSession** parameter of the [Invoke-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/906b4b41-7da8-4330-9363-e7164e5e6970) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 新增可支援「已中斷連線的工作階段」功能的 Cmdlet，包括 [Disconnect-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/f8f95111-612f-4cba-9098-77904b0473d8)、[Connect-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b803dd29-f208-4079-80d4-db04d778f060) 與 Receive-PSSession，亦已新增參數至管理 PSSessions 的 Cmdlet，例如 [Invoke-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/906b4b41-7da8-4330-9363-e7164e5e6970) Cmdlet 的 **InDisconnectedSession** 參數。

trans-unit.source: The Disconnected Sessions feature is supported only when the computers at both the originating ("client") and terminating ("server") ends of the connection are running Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 只有在位於連線起始端 (用戶端) 與終止端 (伺服器) 的電腦是執行 Windows PowerShell 3.0 時，才支援「已中斷連線的工作階段」功能。

trans-unit.source: Robust Session Connectivity
trans-unit.target: 健全的工作階段連線

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 detects unexpected losses of connectivity between the client and server and attempts to reestablish connectivity and resume execution automatically.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 會偵測用戶端與伺服器之間是否發生未預期的連線中斷，並嘗試自動重新建立連線及繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: If the client-server connection cannot be reestablished in the allotted time, the user is notified and the session is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法在配置的時間內重新建立用戶端伺服器連線，就會通知使用者並中斷連線工作階段。

trans-unit.source: During the attempt to reconnect, Windows PowerShell provides continuous feedback to the user.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試重新連線期間，Windows PowerShell 會持續向使用者提供回饋。

trans-unit.source: If the disconnected session was started by using the InvokeCommand, Windows PowerShell creates a job for the disconnected session to make it easier to reconnect and resume execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果是使用 InvokeCommand 啟動中斷連線的工作階段，Windows PowerShell 會為中斷連線的工作階段建立一個工作，使其更容易重新連線及繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: These features provide a more reliable and recoverable remoting experience and allow users to perform long-running tasks that require robust sessions, such as workflows.
trans-unit.target: 這些功能可提供更可靠且更容易修復的遠端體驗，且可允許使用者執行需要健全工作階段的長時間執行工作，例如工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Updatable Help System
trans-unit.target: 可更新的說明系統

trans-unit.source: You can now download updated help files for the cmdlets in your modules.
trans-unit.target: 您現在可以為您模組中的 Cmdlet 下載已更新的說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: The [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet identifies the newest help files, downloads them from the Internet, unpacks them, validates them, and installs them in the correct language-specific directory for the module.
trans-unit.target: [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) Cmdlet 可識別最新的說明檔案，將其從網際網路下載、解壓縮、驗證，然後安裝在模組的正確語言特定目錄中。

trans-unit.source: To use the updated help files, just type `Get-Help`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用已更新的說明檔案，只要輸入 `Get-Help` 即可。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to restart Windows or Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要重新啟動 Windows 或 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: To update help for modules in the $pshome directory, start Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 若要為 $pshome 目錄中的模組更新說明檔案，請使用 [以系統管理員身分執行] 選項啟動 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: To support users who don't have Internet access and users behind firewalls, the new [Save-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aed94f90-b73f-4e25-a25d-7c18d9f161fa) cmdlet downloads help files to a file system directory, such as a file share.
trans-unit.target: 為支援沒有連線網際網路的使用者以及位於防火牆後方的使用者，新的 [Save-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aed94f90-b73f-4e25-a25d-7c18d9f161fa) Cmdlet 會將說明檔案下載到檔案系統目錄，例如檔案共用。

trans-unit.source: Users can then use the [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet to get updated help files from the file share.
trans-unit.target: 使用者即可使用 [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) Cmdlet 從檔案共用取得已更新的說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet to update help files for all or particular modules in all supported UI cultures.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) Cmdlet，針對所有支援的 UI 文化特性中的所有或特定模組，更新其說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can even put an [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) command in your Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 您甚至可以在 Windows PowerShell 設定檔中放入 [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) 命令。

trans-unit.source: By default, Windows PowerShell downloads the help files for a module no more than once each day.
trans-unit.target: 依照預設，Windows PowerShell 一天只會為一個模組下載說明檔案一次。

trans-unit.source: Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 modules do not include help files.
trans-unit.target: Windows 8 與 Windows Server 2012 模組並沒有包含說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: To download the latest help files, type `Update-Help`.
trans-unit.target: 若要下載最新的說明檔案，請輸入 `Update-Help`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, type `Get-Help` (without parameters) or see [about_Updatable_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/10bba75c-f4ac-4ca1-bbf3-8f34dd521ffe).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請輸入 `Get-Help` (不含參數) 或請參閱 [about_Updatable_Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/10bba75c-f4ac-4ca1-bbf3-8f34dd521ffe)。

trans-unit.source: When the help files for a cmdlet are not installed on the computer, the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet now displays auto-generated help.
trans-unit.target: 當電腦上沒有安裝 Cmdlet 的說明檔案時，[Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) Cmdlet 現在會顯示自動產生的說明。

trans-unit.source: The auto-generated help includes the command syntax and instructions for using the [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) cmdlet to download help files.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的說明包括使用 [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) Cmdlet 下載說明檔案的命令語法與指示。

trans-unit.source: Any module author can support Updatable Help for their module.
trans-unit.target: 任何模組作者都可以為其模組的可更新的說明提供支援。

trans-unit.source: You can include help files in the module and use Updatable Help to update them or omit the help files and use Updatable Help to install them.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在模組中包括說明檔案並使用「可更新的說明」來更新說明檔案，或在模組中省略說明檔案並使用「可更新的說明」來安裝說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: For more information about supporting Updatable Help, see [Supporting Updatable Help](http://go.microsoft.com/FWLink/?LinkID=242129) in MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援「可更新的說明」的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 中的[支援可更新的說明](http://go.microsoft.com/FWLink/?LinkID=242129)。

trans-unit.source: Enhanced Online Help
trans-unit.target: 增強的線上說明

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell online help is a valuable resource for all users, but it is especially important to users who do not or cannot install updated help files.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 線上說明對所有使用者來說都是很寶貴的資源，但是對於沒有或無法安裝更新的說明檔案的使用者而言，更是特別重要。

trans-unit.source: To get online help for any Windows PowerShell cmdlet, type:
trans-unit.target: 若要針對任何 Windows PowerShell Cmdlet 取得線上說明，請輸入：

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell opens the online version of the help topic in your default Internet browser.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 會在您的預設網際網路瀏覽器中開啟說明主題的線上版本。

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Help -Online** feature in Windows PowerShell 3.0 is now even more powerful because it works even when help files for the cmdlet are not installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 中的 **Get-Help -Online** 功能現在更強大了，因為即使電腦上沒有安裝 Cmdlet 的說明檔案，它也可以運作。

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Help -Online** feature gets the URI for online help topic from the HelpUri property of cmdlets and advanced functions.
trans-unit.target: **Get-Help -Online** 功能會從 Cmdlet 與進階函式的 HelpUri 屬性取得線上說明主題的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, authors of C# cmdlets can populate the **HelpUri** property by creating a **HelpUri** attribute on the cmdlet class.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，C# Cmdlet 的作者可以透過在 Cmdlet 類別上建立 **HelpUri** 屬性來填入 **HelpUri** 內容。

trans-unit.source: Authors of advanced functions can define a **HelpUri** property on the **CmdletBinding** attribute.
trans-unit.target: 進階函式的作者可以在 **CmdletBinding** 屬性上定義 **HelpUri** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **HelpUri** property must begin with "http" or "https".
trans-unit.target: **HelpUri** 屬性的值必須以 "http" 或 "https" 作為開頭。

trans-unit.source: You can also include a **HelpUri** value in the first related link of an XML-based cmdlet help file or the .Link directive of comment-based help in a function.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在以 XML 為基礎之 Cmdlet 說明檔案的第一個相關連結中包含 **HelpUri** 值，或在函式中包含以註解為基礎之說明的 .Link 指示詞。

trans-unit.source: For more information about supporting online help, see [Supporting Online Help](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=242132) in MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援「可更新的說明」的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 中的[支援線上說明](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=242132)。

trans-unit.source: CIM integration
trans-unit.target: CIM 整合

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 includes support for the Common Information Model (CIM), which provides common definitions of management information for systems, networks, applications, and services, allowing them the exchange of management information between heterogeneous systems.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 支援通用訊息模型 (CIM)，它可為系統、網路、應用程式及服務提供管理資訊的一般定義，讓它們能夠在異質系統之間交換管理資訊。

trans-unit.source: Support for CIM in Windows PowerShell 3.0, including the ability to author Windows PowerShell cmdlets based on new or existing CIM classes, commands based on cmdlet definition XML files, support for CIM .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 中對 CIM 的支援，包括依據新的或現有的 CIM 類別編寫 Windows PowerShell Cmdlet 的能力、依據 Cmdlet 定義 XML 檔案編寫命令的能力，以及針對 CIM .NET Framework 的支援。

trans-unit.source: API, CIM management cmdlets and WMI 2.0 providers.
trans-unit.target: API、CIM 管理 Cmdlet 與 WMI 2.0 提供者。

trans-unit.source: Session Configuration Files
trans-unit.target: 工作階段設定檔案

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, you can design a custom session configuration by using a file.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 3.0 開始，您可以使用檔案來設計自訂工作階段設定。

trans-unit.source: The new session configuration file lets you determine the environment of sessions that use the session configuration, including which modules, scripts, and format files are loaded into sessions, which cmdlets and language elements users can use, which modules and scripts they can run, and which variables they can see.
trans-unit.target: 新的工作階段設定檔案可讓您決定使用工作階段設定之工作階段的環境，包括要在工作階段中載入哪些模組、指令碼及格式檔案、使用者可以使用哪些 Cmdlet 和語言元素、使用者可以執行哪些模組和指令碼，以及使用者可以看見哪些變數。

trans-unit.source: You can design a session in which users can only run the cmdlets from one particular module, or a session in which users have full language, access to all modules, and access to scripts that perform advanced tasks.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設計一個工作階段，讓使用者只能在裡面執行來自某個特定模組的 Cmdlet，或設計一個工作階段，讓使用者在裡面擁有完整語言、所有模組的完整存取權，以及可執行進階工作之指令碼的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of Windows PowerShell, control at this level was available only to those who could write a C# program or a complex start-up script.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的 Windows PowerShell 中，只有能夠撰寫 C\# 程式或複雜啟動指令碼的人員才能執行此層級的控制。

trans-unit.source: Now, any member of the Administrators group on the computer can customize a session configuration by using a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 現在電腦上 Administrators 群組的任何成員都可以使用設定檔案來自訂工作階段設定。

trans-unit.source: To create a session configuration file, use the [New-PSSessionConfigurationFile](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5f3e3633-6e90-479c-aea9-ba45a1954866) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立工作階段設定檔案，請使用 [New-PSSessionConfigurationFile](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5f3e3633-6e90-479c-aea9-ba45a1954866) Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To apply the session configuration file to a session configuration, use the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) or [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要將工作階段設定檔案套用到工作階段設定，請使用 [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) 或 [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Session_Configuration_Files](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c7217447-1ebf-477b-a8ef-4dbe9a1473b8) and [New-PSSessionConfigurationFile](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5f3e3633-6e90-479c-aea9-ba45a1954866).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Session_Configuration_Files](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c7217447-1ebf-477b-a8ef-4dbe9a1473b8) 與 [New-PSSessionConfigurationFile](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5f3e3633-6e90-479c-aea9-ba45a1954866)。

trans-unit.source: Scheduled Jobs and Task Scheduler Integration
trans-unit.target: 排程工作與工作排程器整合

trans-unit.source: You can now schedule Windows PowerShell background jobs and manage them in Windows PowerShell and in Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 您現在可以排程 Windows PowerShell 背景工作，並在 Windows PowerShell 和工作排程器中管理它們。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell scheduled jobs are a useful hybrid of Windows PowerShell background jobs and Task Scheduler tasks.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 排程工作為 Windows PowerShell 背景工作及工作排程器工作的有用混合體。

trans-unit.source: Like Windows PowerShell background jobs, scheduled jobs run asynchronously in the background.
trans-unit.target: 排程工作就像 Windows PowerShell 背景工作一樣，會在背景中以非同步方式執行。

trans-unit.source: Instances of scheduled jobs that have completed can be managed by using the job cmdlets, such as [Start-Job](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2bc04935-0deb-4ec0-b856-d7290cca6442) and [Get-Job](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1352c534-7193-46ca-9ab1-0c5219a661ad).
trans-unit.target: 您可使用 Job Cmdlet 來管理已完成之排程工作的執行個體，例如 [Start-Job](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2bc04935-0deb-4ec0-b856-d7290cca6442) 與 [Get-Job](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1352c534-7193-46ca-9ab1-0c5219a661ad)。

trans-unit.source: Like Task Scheduler tasks, you can run scheduled jobs on a one-time or recurrent schedule, or in response to an action or event.
trans-unit.target: 就像工作排程器工作一樣，您可以在單次或週期性排程中執行排程工作，或在偵測到某個動作或事件時執行排程工作。

trans-unit.source: You can view and manage scheduled jobs in Task Scheduler, enable and disable them as needed, run them or use them as templates, and set conditions under which the jobs start.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在工作排程器中檢視及管理排程工作、視需要啟用及停用排程工作、將排程工作做為範例來執行或使用，以及設定工作啟動時所依據的條件。

trans-unit.source: In addition, scheduled jobs come with a customized set of cmdlets for managing them.
trans-unit.target: 此外，排程工作也隨附一組自訂的 Cmdlet 以用於管理排程工作。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets let you create, edit, manage, disable, and re-enable scheduled jobs, create scheduled job triggers and set scheduled job options.
trans-unit.target: 這些 Cmdlet 可讓您建立、編輯、管理、停用及重新啟用排程工作、建立排程工作觸發程序，以及設定排程工作選項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about scheduled jobs, see [about_Scheduled_Jobs](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/3b546629-703c-4939-b44f-52dd567bce92).
trans-unit.target: 如需排程工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Scheduled_Jobs](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/3b546629-703c-4939-b44f-52dd567bce92)。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Language Enhancements
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 語言增強功能

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 includes many features that are designed to make its language simpler, easier to use, and to avoid common errors.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 包括許多為了使其語言更簡單、更容易使用，以及避免發生一般錯誤所設計的功能。

trans-unit.source: The improvements include property enumeration, count and length properties on scalar objects, new redirection operators, the $Using scope modifier, PSItem automatic variable, flexible script formatting, attributes of variables, simplified attribute arguments, numeric command names, the Stop-Parsing operator, improved array splatting, new bit operators, ordered dictionaries, PSCustomObject casting, and improved comment-based help.
trans-unit.target: 這些改善項目包括屬性列舉、純量物件的計數和長度屬性、新的重新導向運算子、$Using 範圍修飾詞、PSItem 自動變數、彈性指令碼格式設定、變數屬性、簡化的屬性引數、數字命令名稱、Stop-Parsing 運算子、改善的陣列展開、全新位元運算子、排序的字典、PSCustomObject 轉換，以及改善的以註解為基礎的說明。

trans-unit.source: New Core Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: 新的核心 Cmdlet

trans-unit.source: New cmdlets were added to the Windows PowerShell Core installation, including cmdlets to manage scheduled jobs, disconnected sessions, CIM integration and the Updatable Help System.
trans-unit.target: 新的 Cmdlet 已經新增至 Windows PowerShell 核心安裝，包括用來管理排程工作、已中斷連線的工作階段、CIM 整合，以及可更新的說明系統的 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Improvements to Existing Core Cmdlets and Providers
trans-unit.target: 對現有核心 Cmdlet 與提供者的改善

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 includes new features for existing cmdlets including the simplified syntax, and new parameters for the following cmdlets: Computer cmdlets, CSV cmdlets, Get-ChildItem, Get-Command, Get-Content, Get-History, Measure-Object, Security cmdlets, Select-Object, Select-String, Split-Path, Start-Process, Tee-Object, Test-Connection, Add-Member, and WMI cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 包含針對現有 Cmdlet 的新功能，包括簡化的語法，以及下列 Cmdlet 的新參數：Computer Cmdlet、CSV Cmdlet、Get\-ChildItem、Get\-Command、Get\-Content、Get\-History、Measure\-Object、Security Cmdlet、Select\-Object、Select\-String、Split\-Path、Start\-Process、Tee\-Object、Test\-Connection、Add\-Member 與 WMI Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell providers were also improved significantly, including Certificate provider support for managing Secure Socket Layer (SSL) certificates for web hosting, support for credential, persistent network drives, and alternate data streams in file system drives.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 提供者也已經大幅改善，包括用於管理虛擬主機之安全通訊端層 (SSL) 憑證的憑證提供者支援，認證支援、持續性網路磁碟機，以及檔案系統磁碟機中的替代資料流。

trans-unit.source: Remote module import and discovery
trans-unit.target: 遠端模組匯入及探索

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 extends module discovery, importing, and implicit remoting capabilities on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 可延伸遠端電腦上的模組探索、匯入及隱含遠端執行功能。

trans-unit.source: The Module cmdlets get modules on remote computers and import the modules to the remote or local computer by using Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: Module Cmdlet 可使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端執行功能取得遠端電腦上的模組，並且將模組匯入到遠端或本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: New CIM session support allows you to use CIM and WMI to manage non-Windows computers by importing commands to the local computer that run implicitly on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 新的 CIM 工作階段支援可讓您透過將在遠端電腦上以隱含方式執行的命令匯入到本機電腦，以使用 CIM 和 WMI 來管理非 Windows 電腦。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the help topics for the [Get-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2cccd4c4-9a21-4c77-b691-984ee57242e1) and [Import-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/af616c24-e122-4098-930e-1e3ea2080ade) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Get-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/2cccd4c4-9a21-4c77-b691-984ee57242e1) 與 [Import-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/af616c24-e122-4098-930e-1e3ea2080ade) Cmdlet 的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: Enhanced Tab Completion
trans-unit.target: 增強的 Tab 鍵自動完成

trans-unit.source: Tab completion in the Windows PowerShell console now completes the names of cmdlets, parameters, parameter values, enumerations, .NET Frameworks types, COM objects, hidden directories, and more.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 主控台中的 Tab 鍵自動完成現在可以完成 Cmdlet、參數、參數值、列舉、.NET Frameworks 類型、COM 物件、隱藏目錄及其他項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The tab completion feature is completely rewritten based on a new parser and abstract syntax tree to support more scenarios, including in-memory parsing trees and midline tab completion.
trans-unit.target: Tab 鍵自動完成功能可以依據新的剖析器與抽象語法樹來重新撰寫，以支援更多案例，包括記憶體內部剖析樹狀結構和中線 Tab 鍵自動完成。

trans-unit.source: Module Auto-Loading
trans-unit.target: 模組自動載入

trans-unit.source: The [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) cmdlet now gets all cmdlets and functions from all modules that are installed on the computer, even if the module is not imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) Cmdlet 現在可取得電腦上安裝之全部模組的所有 Cmdlet 和函式，即使模組沒有匯入目前的工作階段中也一樣。

trans-unit.source: When you get the cmdlet that you need, you can use it immediately without importing any modules.
trans-unit.target: 當您取得您需要的 Cmdlet 時，您可以立即使用，不需要匯入任何模組。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell modules are now imported automatically when you use any cmdlet in the module.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 模組現在會在您使用模組中的任何 Cmdlet 時自動匯入。

trans-unit.source: You no longer need to search for the module and import it to use its cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要再搜尋及匯入模組，就可以使用模組的 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Automatic importing of modules is triggered by using the cmdlet in a command, running **Get-Command** for a cmdlet without wildcards, or running [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) for a cmdlet without wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 觸發自動匯入模組的方式是，在命令中使用 Cmdlet、執行不含萬用字元之 Cmdlet 的 **Get-Command**，或執行不含萬用字元之 Cmdlet 的 [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a)。

trans-unit.source: You can enable, disable, and configure automatic importing of modules by using the **$PSModuleAutoLoadingPreference** preference variable.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **$PSModuleAutoLoadingPreference** 喜好設定變數來啟用、停用及設定自動匯入模組。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Modules [v4]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/94f57429-a539-4aee-bb0d-205cd7e801f9), [about_Preference_Variables [v4]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/31344314-be29-4286-b039-afa5460cbe8b), and the help topics for the [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) and [Import-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/af616c24-e122-4098-930e-1e3ea2080ade) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Modules [v4]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/94f57429-a539-4aee-bb0d-205cd7e801f9)、[about_Preference_Variables [v4]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/31344314-be29-4286-b039-afa5460cbe8b) 及 [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) 與 [Import-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/af616c24-e122-4098-930e-1e3ea2080ade) Cmdlet 的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: Module Experience Improvements
trans-unit.target: 模組體驗改善

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 brings advanced feature support to modules, including the following new features.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 帶來了對模組的進階功能支援，包括下列新功能。

trans-unit.source: Module logging for individual modules (LogPipelineExecutionDetails) and the new "Turn on Module Logging" Group Policy setting
trans-unit.target: 個別模組的模組記錄 (LogPipelineExecutionDetails) 和新的「開啟模組記錄」群組原則設定。

trans-unit.source: Extended module objects that expose the values from the module manifest
trans-unit.target: 可公開模組資訊清單中的值的延伸模組物件

trans-unit.source: New **ExportedCommands** property of modules, including nested modules, that combines commands of all types
trans-unit.target: 模組 (包括巢狀模組) 的新 **ExportedCommands** 屬性，結合了所有類型的命令

trans-unit.source: Improved discovery of available (un-imported) modules, including allowing the **Path** and **ListAvailable** parameters in the same command
trans-unit.target: 改善的可用 (未匯入) 模組探索功能，包括在同一命令中允許使用 **Path** 與 **ListAvailable** 參數

trans-unit.source: New **DefaultCommandPrefix** key in module manifests that avoids name conflicts without changing module code.
trans-unit.target: 模組資訊清單中新的 **DefaultCommandPrefix** 索引鍵，可在不變更模組程式碼的情況下避免名稱衝突

trans-unit.source: Improved module requirements, including fully-qualified required modules with version and GUID and automatic importing of required modules
trans-unit.target: 改善的模組需求，包括完整的必要模組 (包含版本與 GUID)，以及自動匯入必要模組

trans-unit.source: Quieter, streamlined operation of the [New-ModuleManifest](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/512adced-f42f-4e88-ba7c-834fc9e5d047) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 更安靜、更簡化的 [New-ModuleManifest](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/512adced-f42f-4e88-ba7c-834fc9e5d047) Cmdlet 運作。

trans-unit.source: New **Module** parameter for #Requires
trans-unit.target: #Requires 的新 **Module** 參數

trans-unit.source: Improved [Import-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/af616c24-e122-4098-930e-1e3ea2080ade) cmdlet with both **MinimumVersion** and **RequiredVersion** parameters.
trans-unit.target: 改善的 [Import-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/af616c24-e122-4098-930e-1e3ea2080ade) Cmdlet (包含 **MinimumVersion** 與 **RequiredVersion** 參數)

trans-unit.source: Simplified Command Discovery
trans-unit.target: 簡化的命令探索

trans-unit.source: You no longer need to import all modules to discover the commands available to your session.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要再匯入所有模組即可探索您的工作階段中可用的命令。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 3.0, the [Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) cmdlet gets all commands from all installed modules.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，[Get-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/59c6d302-6e8c-48b7-a6f6-f0172df936ad) Cmdlet 會從所有已安裝的模組中取得所有命令。

trans-unit.source: And, if you use a command, the module that exports the command is automatically imported into your session.
trans-unit.target: 而且，當您使用命令時，匯出命令的模組就會自動匯入到您的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The new [Show-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/65bba50b-91a8-49d5-80a2-a30fc684ba41) cmdlet is designed especially for beginners.
trans-unit.target: 新的 [Show-Command](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/65bba50b-91a8-49d5-80a2-a30fc684ba41) Cmdlet 是特別為初學者所設計。

trans-unit.source: You can search for commands in a window.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在視窗中搜尋命令。

trans-unit.source: You can view all commands or filter by module, import a module by clicking a button, use text boxes and drop-down lists to construct a valid command, and then copy or run the command without ever leaving the window.
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接在視窗中檢視所有命令或依模組篩選命令、按一下按鈕來匯入模組、使用文字方塊與下拉式清單建構有效的命令，然後複製或執行命令。

trans-unit.source: Improved Logging, Diagnostics, and Group Policy Support
trans-unit.target: 改善的記錄、診斷與群組原則支援

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 improves the logging and tracing support for commands and modules with support for Event Tracing in Windows (ETW) logs, an editable **LogPipelineExecutionDetails** property of modules, and the "Turn on Module Logging" Group Policy setting.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 透過支援 Windows 事件追蹤 (ETW) 記錄檔、模組的可編輯 **LogPipelineExecutionDetails** 屬性，以及「開啟模組記錄」群組原則設定，改善了命令與模組的記錄與追蹤支援。

trans-unit.source: You can now get parameter values from log details by displaying the log properties.
trans-unit.target: 您現在可以透過顯示記錄內容，來從記錄詳細資料中取得參數值。

trans-unit.source: Formatting and Output Improvements
trans-unit.target: 格式設定與輸出改善

trans-unit.source: New formatting and output improvements improve the efficiency of all Windows PowerShell users.
trans-unit.target: 新的格式設定與輸出改善項目改善了所有 Windows PowerShell 使用者的效率。

trans-unit.source: The improvements include output redirection for all streams, an enhanced Update-Type cmdlet that adds types dynamically without Format.ps1xml files, word wrap in output, default formatting properties of custom objects, the **PSCustomObject** type, improved formatting for WMI objects and heterogeneous objects, and support for discovering method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 改善項目包括所有資料流的輸出重新導向、在沒有 Format.ps1xml 檔案的情況下動態新增類型的已增強 Update-Type Cmdlet、在輸出中自動換行、自訂物件的預設格式設定屬性、**PSCustomObject** 類型、改善的 WMI 物件與異質物件格式設定，以及支援探索方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Enhanced Console Host Experience
trans-unit.target: 增強的主控台主機體驗

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell console host program has new features in Windows PowerShell 3.0 including single threaded apartment by default.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 主控台主機程式在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中擁有新的功能，包括預設的單一執行緒 Apartment。

trans-unit.source: The new "Run with PowerShell" option in File Explorer lets you run scripts in a unrestricted session just by right-clicking.
trans-unit.target: 檔案總管中新的 [用 PowerShell 執行] 選項，可讓您只要以滑鼠右鍵按一下，就可以在不受限制的工作階段中執行指令碼。

trans-unit.source: New console host launch logic starts Windows PowerShell faster and new fonts allow you to personalize the familiar console window experience.
trans-unit.target: 新的主控台主機啟動邏輯可以更快速地啟動 Windows PowerShell，而新字型則可以讓您將熟悉的主控台視窗體驗個人化。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [about_Run_With_PowerShell](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c9d9ca5f-eff9-4409-be9d-e43b5b4087eb).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [about_Run_With_PowerShell](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/c9d9ca5f-eff9-4409-be9d-e43b5b4087eb)。

trans-unit.source: New Cmdlet and Hosting APIs
trans-unit.target: 新的 Cmdlet 與裝載 API

trans-unit.source: The new Cmdlet API and Hosting API include public advanced syntax tree (AST) APIs, and APIs for pipeline paging, nested pipelines, runspace pools tab completion, Windows RT, the Obsolete cmdlet attribute, and Verb and Noun properties of the FunctionInfo object.
trans-unit.target: 新的 Cmdlet API 與裝載 API 包括公用進階語法樹 (AST) API，以及用於管線分頁、巢狀管線、Runspace 集區 Tab 鍵自動完成、Windows RT、過時 Cmdlet 屬性，以及 FunctionInfo 物件之 Verb 與 Noun 屬性的 API。

trans-unit.source: Performance Improvements
trans-unit.target: 效能改善

trans-unit.source: Significant performance improvements in Windows PowerShell come from the new language parser, which is built on Dynamic Runtime Language (DLR) in .NET Framework 4., along with runtime script compilation, engine reliability improvements, and changes to the algorithm of the [Get-ChildItem](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/75cf79bb-4db6-4a67-8c36-3d20754e2190) that improve its performance, especially when searching network shares.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 中效能大幅改善的原因是來自全新的語言剖析器 (以 .NET Framework 4 中的動態執行階段語言 (DLR) 為基礎所建立) 以及改善的執行階段指令碼編譯、引擎可靠性，而 [Get-ChildItem](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/75cf79bb-4db6-4a67-8c36-3d20754e2190) 的演算法變更改善了它的效能，特別是在搜尋網路共用時。

trans-unit.source: RunAs and Shared Host Support
trans-unit.target: RunAs 與共用主機支援

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 includes support for RunAs and Shared Host features.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 支援 RunAs 與共用主機功能。

trans-unit.source: The *RunAs* feature, designed for Windows PowerShell Workflow, lets users of a session configuration create sessions that run with the permission of a shared user account.
trans-unit.target: *RunAs* 功能是針對 Windows PowerShell 工作流程所設計，可讓工作階段設定的使用者建立使用共用使用者帳戶之權限執行的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This enables less privileged users to run particular commands and scripts with administrator permissions, and reduces the need for adding less senior users to the Administrators group.
trans-unit.target: 這可以讓權限較少的使用者以系統管理員權限執行特定命令與指令碼，以及減少新增較初階使用者至 Administrators 群組的需求。

trans-unit.source: The **SharedHost** feature allows multiple users on multiple computers to connect to a workflow session concurrently and monitor the progress of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: **SharedHost** 功能可允許多部電腦上的多名使用者同時連線至工作流程工作階段，並監視工作流程的進度。

trans-unit.source: Users can start a workflow on one computer and then connect to the workflow session on another computer without disconnecting the session from the original computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以在某一部電腦上啟動工作流程，然後連線至另一部電腦上的工作流程工作階段，不需要與原始電腦中的工作階段中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: Users must have the same permissions and be using the same session configuration.
trans-unit.target: 使用者必須具備相同權限，並使用相同的工作階段設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Running a Windows PowerShell Workflow" in Getting Started with Windows PowerShell Workflow.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱＜開始使用 Windows PowerShell 工作流程＞中的＜執行 Windows PowerShell 工作流程＞。

trans-unit.source: Special Character Handling Improvements
trans-unit.target: 特殊字元處理改善

trans-unit.source: To improve the ability of Windows PowerShell 3.0 to interpret and correctly handle special characters, the **LiteralPath** parameter, which handles special characters in paths, is valid on almost all cmdlets that have a **Path** parameter, including the new [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) and [Save-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aed94f90-b73f-4e25-a25d-7c18d9f161fa) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 為改善 Windows PowerShell 3.0 解譯及正確處理特殊字元的能力，用來處理路徑中特殊字元的 **LiteralPath** 參數在所有擁有 **Path** 參數的 Cmdlet (包括新的 [Update-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/93e1d870-ace6-432b-8778-8920291d7545) 與 [Save-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aed94f90-b73f-4e25-a25d-7c18d9f161fa) Cmdlet) 上幾乎都是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The parser also includes special logic to improve handling of the backtick character (\`) and square brackets in file names and paths.
trans-unit.target: 剖析器也包含特殊邏輯，可改善對檔案名稱與路徑中的倒引號字元 (\`) 及方括弧的處理能力。

trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
